attributes.comment:
This proposal to greatly raise filing fees, if adopted, would increase already
substantial costs for obtaining and filing documents relating to immigration and
naturalization an average of sixty six percent (66%!) over current fees! For
families wishing to adopt orphaned children from other countries this increase is
unjustifiable. This would unduly add to the very substantial financial burden such
families already endure to simply provide these needy children a loving home and
upbringing, and an opportunity to fulfill the promise these children bring to
America. And in cases where the length of the adoption process requires the
documents be renewed, these hefty fees would have to be paid again! Please
reconsider this huge increase in fees and the tremendous burden it would place on
adoptive families.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Albert Grossniklaus
